allOf.desc: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.desc: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

systemData.desc: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.desc: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.desc: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.desc: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

lastModifiedBy.desc: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.desc: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

type.desc: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

allOf.title: Resource

ov.desc: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager tracked top level resource which has 'tags' and a 'location'

location.desc: The geo-location where the resource lives

ov.title: Tracked Resource

groupDN.desc: This specifies the group DN, which overrides the base DN for group lookups.

groupMembershipFilter.desc: This specifies the custom LDAP search filter to be used when looking up group membership from LDAP server.

userDN.desc: This specifies the user DN, which overrides the base DN for user lookups.

v.desc: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.desc: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.desc: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.desc: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

lastModifiedBy.desc: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.desc: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

v.desc: Tags are a list of key-value pairs that describe the resource

v.desc: Tags are a list of key-value pairs that describe the resource

sch.ov: Provisioned size of the pool (in bytes). Allowed values are in 4TiB chunks (value must be multiply of 4398046511104).
sch.v: Provisioned size of the pool (in bytes). Allowed values are in 1TiB chunks (value must be multiply of 4398046511104).

sch.ov: Provisioned size of the pool (in bytes). Allowed values are in 4TiB chunks (value must be multiply of 4398046511104).
sch.v: Provisioned size of the pool (in bytes). Allowed values are in 1TiB chunks (value must be multiply of 4398046511104).

v.desc: Flag indicating whether subvolume operations are enabled on the volume
Maximum number of files allowed. Needs a service request in order to be changed. Only allowed to be changed if volume quota is more than 4TiB.
